item.title: Obtention de financements pour la cartographie des installations d'urgence au Sénégal
item.description: Applications are now open for HOT’s Rapid Response Microgrant: #COVID19. Microgrants will be awarded to 4-8 OSM communities in Low and Middle Income Countries to enable vulnerable communities to be supported during the pandemic, https://t.
